__e: You're the smartest and the strongest and the scariest, so make him stop.
Be a good boy and make him stop, on account of Jesus!
Let's get out of here and leave. Tell him to please stop the car and let us out.
Make him feel good on his first day.
Lyndon talks the way they do, he thinks the way they do, but he's working for me, so do me a favor-- make him feel important once in a while.
Make him feel like he's beneath you. That way, he'd be too afraid not to let you in. Right?
Do it for me like I did it for your friend.
You have to talk to them to say something. Do it for me. - Say something.
Now, if you wish to hear the story of his life, kindly do so on your own time.
When the doctor comes, send him in.
Go, take the bribe; and bring me Pothinus.
If he is out there, you bring him in.
If that's your husband, find out where he is, but keep on talking.
If he is close by then make him talk to me.
Call your dad again and get him to talk about something else.
God, please make him stay for, like--
Look, I just need you to get him alone, then I can shoot him.
"Make him stand on the other side of the door."
